participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, loves to create memories through baking and reading.
participant_1.background: I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship. I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year. I love to read and cook. I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well. Since I have fibromyalgia, the harsher winters here in PA will be rough on me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, enjoys trying new things and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to see what the weekend brings! I am not married, but my family is very supportive of my music and writing. I play ice hockey. I'm in love with Adam Levine. I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Hello! Mine is going well so far, thanks for asking! How about yours?
It's going great so far! I just finished baking a batch of chocolate chip cookies for my family.
Yum, that sounds delicious! I love chocolate chip cookies. I'm excited to see what the weekend brings!
What are you looking forward to doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to see what it brings! I might go ice skating with my friends, or I might just stay in and relax.
Sounds like you're going to have a great weekend! I'm going to be baking some more cookies and reading a book.
That sounds like a great way to spend the weekend! I love baking cookies.
Me too! They're so delicious and they make the house smell amazing.
I agree! I love the smell of cookies baking.
Me too! It's so cozy and homey.
I'm glad we're on the same page about cookies. They're the best.
They are! I can't get enough of them.
